title: Does it feel like a long ten minutes? (TEFC)
creator_credit: Andrew Vial Film Productions, Liz Rust and Andrew Vial
brief_description: A educational program about the procedure of abortion. Shows a simulated pregnancy termination with both the doctor and the counsellor explaining the procedure to the patient.
